\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 47726}

\subsection*{How I Pass My Tests}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Anonymous}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 &   & smoked & Cannabis & daily\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 175.00 lbs\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I have been a regular marijuana smoker for many years and the only time I ever failed a drug test was when I bought one of those cleansing drinks. The most effective method I've found is just coffee and a fist full of vitamins. 



I work with juvenile delinquents and drug testing is mandatory for almost every job I've had. I refrain from smoking for a day or two( just to be cautious), drink a pot or 2 of coffee and eat some vitamins, and make sure I'm peeing every 15-20 minutes, and pee right before my test (I usually go right beside my car in the parking lot before I go in). It's always worked for me.

\end{document}
